name: I Can't Hustle Any Harder Than This

episodes.title: "I was in a business cult!" PART 1 with Anna Failla
episodes.description:
"It turned out that there wasn't an apartment for each of us, paid for by the company, like they said there would be. There were four of us, sleeping on air mattresses, in a one-bedroom apartment."

Join us as we talk to Anna Faila about her experience in a business cult, "DevilCorp," (real name changed, of course) during her early 20s. When Anna and I first started talking about entrepreneurship, I had no idea that our discussion would lead here, but I knew immediately we needed to bring her on the podcast.

This was the wildest interview we've done yet and we loved it so much, we're bringing Anna back for a second one! 

#entrepreneurship #scam #scammer #business #cults #devilcorp
